keyword: calories in chick fil a medium fries
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Medium Fries

quick_answer.text: One medium serving of Chick-fil-A fries contains 420 kcal and 55g of carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A medium fries?
What are the carbs in Chick-fil-A medium fries?
faqs.a: 55g total carbs, including 6g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in Chick-fil-A medium fries?
faqs.a: 20g total fat, with 3g saturated and 0g trans fat.
Yes, the waffle fries are gluten-free, but check for cross-contamination.

faqs.q: How does sodium in Chick-fil-A medium fries compare?
faqs.a: 240mg sodium per serving, about 10% of daily recommended intake.
